snippet: Several investors said that they wanted the banks to do a thorough analysis on whether it made sense to move, after Britain raised the bank tax by a third.

byline.original: By STEVE SLATER and SINEAD CRUISE | REUTERS

lead_paragraph: Several investors said that they wanted the banks to do a thorough analysis on whether it made sense to move, after Britain raised the bank tax by a third.

headline.main: HSBC and Standard Chartered Weigh a Move to Asia
headline.print_headline: HSBC and Standard Chartered Weigh a Move to Asia
